txt.en: Return to Pinja with the furs and flowers
Collected white furs ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Picked snowdrops ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Delivered the wedding invitation
You have played an important part in the courtship of Kaj and Pinja.
Delivered the Wedding Invitation

'The wedding will be soon, but I need two things for my marriage dress: white furs for the trim and the cape, and snowdrops for the bouquet. Also, please deliver this invitation personally to Ella in Pynti-peldot; she raised me after my mother died, and since she moved back into the village, we have not seen as much of each other as I would like.

'The highest concentration of kalpa-kita is at Leijona-kotin, a wooded area just south of here.  Their fur is the softest and the whitest, and I want the best for my marriage dress!

'Snowdrops can also be found in and around Leijona-kotin, as there they can grow in the shelter of the evergreens.'

Snowdrops and white furs can be collected at Leijona-kotin, south of Pinja's homestead, which is south-west of Pynti-peldot in It√§-ma. Ella is at Pynti-peldot.\n\nPinja has asked that you gather the winter-blooming snowdrops and white furs for her marriage dress, and that you hand-deliver an important invitation to Ella in Pynti-peldot.

'Oh, my little Pinja is getting married? How lovely! Tell her that of course I will be there.

'I had my doubts that any suitor would ever even get near her, with those brothers of hers. Overprotective to a fault.

'I am somehow not surprised that it took the bravest warrior of the tribe to brave them. Ora must be so pleased!'
Pinja is at her homestead, south-west of Pynti-peldot.\n\nYou should return to Pinja with the snowdrops and furs.
'Bring me the things I asked...I have a wedding to prepare for!'
'Blessings of the ice-spirits upon you, Sivullinen. It is in part thanks to your efforts that Pynti-peldot will host a happy union!'
'You will find Pinja at Lumi-talletta, her home. Follow the road south-west.'
'Could you not find what I need?'
Collect white furs ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Pick snowdrops ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Deliver the invitation to Ella at Pynti-peldot
Return to Pinja with the furs and flowers
A Midwinter's Thaw
You have earned the trust of the Lossoth-chieftain's son and his bride!
